metadata.title: CVE-2019-17561 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The "Apache NetBeans" autoupdate system does not fully validate code signatures. An attacker could modify the downloaded nbm and include additional code. "Apache NetBeans" versions up to and including 11.2 are affected by this vulnerability.

notes.note: seth-arnold> Likely this only affects Windows and OS X versions

criterions.comment: netbeans package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
